import React, {useState} from 'react'; import Slider from 'react-slick' import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick.css' import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import img from "../../img/download.svg"; import Left_Laptop from "../../img/left-curved-arrow.png" import Right_Laptop from "../../img/left-curved.png" import './css/sanphaplaptop.css' const Sanphamlaptop = () => { const Data = [ { id_danhmuc: 1, id_tensanpham: '1', danhmuc: 'Macbook', }, { id_danhmuc: 2, id_tensanpham: '1', danhmuc: 'Thinkpad', }, { id_danhmuc: 3, id_tensanpham: '1',
